revised_title: The Geology and Topography of the Soufrière Eruption in St. Vincent and Montagne Pelée in Martinique
tldr: This report examines the geological and topographical changes in the districts affected by the 1902 eruptions of the Soufrière in St. Vincent and Montagne Pelée in Martinique. The study focuses on the denudation of deposits left by the eruption, the forces that shaped the islands' features, and the subsequent volcanic disturbances and vegetation recovery in the devastated areas.
